availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Graves County, Kentucky, farmer. New York native. Married to Sarah Smith. Father of Eliza Smith, E. D. Smith, Nancy Smith, Martha Smith, Thomas Smith., Susan Smith, and Georgina Smith. Farmer in Graves County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, District 2, p. 375. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, p. 23. Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Graves County, Haynes, p. 7. Find A Grave, "Eli Smith (1805-1880)," Memorial #85003428, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/85003428/eli-smith (accessed June 14, 2017). KYR-0001-029-0595.
